title: Found another game during champion select?
body:
So I was in champion select, I selected a champion and alt tabbed. 
Then the sound of findg a match plays on the backgroud and i saw a pop up like the one in the picture.
http://i.imgur.com/4YW3vcc.png
I clicked play now, and for a split second i could see the champion i selected before (in the previous champion select) and the client just turned black.

replies.body: Not sure if its linked to the problem, but I just joined an aram and I clicked join game once it popped. and it was black screen. I waited about 3 minutes and then had to press the x at the top right. I rejoined in and I was not in a game and could proceed to que for another aram which worked correctly. (I think someone may not have clicked otherwise I would have had a 5 min wait for failing to load into the champ select screen idk). But yeah It seems a random bug or something. Idk. All i could see was black screen in the LoL client
